mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR.COUPON_COUPON (COUPON_NUM, COUPON_NAME, CONPON_SERIAL, COUPON_IMAGE, COUPON_DESCRIPTION, COUPON_PRICE, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_CATAGORY, COUPON_OWNER, COUPON_BUYER, IS_COUPON_FINISHED, IS_COUPON_DETERMINED, IS_COUPON_CHEATED, COUPON_FINISH_DATE) VALUES(COUPON_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{coupon_name}, #{coupon_serial}, ${coupon_image}, #{coupon_description}, ${coupon_price}, #{coupon_type}, #{coupon_catagory}, #{coupon_owner}, NULL, 0, 0, 0, TO_DATE('${coupon_finish_date} 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_NUM, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_PRICE, COUPON_CATAGORY, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_OWNER, COUPON_BUYER FROM HR.COUPON_COUPON WHERE COUPON_BUYER IS NULL AND (SYSDATE + 7) < COUPON_FINISH_DATE ORDER BY COUPON_NUM ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HR.COUPON_COUPON WHERE COUPON_NUM = ${coupon_num} AND COUPON_OWNER = #{coupon_owner} AND COUPON_BUYER IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_NUM, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_PRICE, COUPON_CATAGORY, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_OWNER, COUPON_BUYER FROM HR.COUPON_COUPON WHERE COUPON_NAME LIKE '%${search_value}%' AND COUPON_BUYER IS NULL AND (SYSDATE + 7) < COUPON_FINISH_DATE

SELECT COUPON_NUM, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_PRICE, COUPON_CATAGORY, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_OWNER, COUPON_BUYER FROM HR.COUPON_COUPON WHERE ${search_field} = #{search_value} AND COUPON_BUYER IS NULL AND (SYSDATE + 7) < COUPON_FINISH_DATE ORDER BY COUPON_NUM ASC
SELECT COUPON_NUM, COUPON_NAME, COUPON_PRICE, COUPON_CATAGORY, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_OWNER, COUPON_BUYER FROM HR.COUPON_COUPON WHERE COUPON_OWNER = #{email} ORDER BY COUPON_NUM ASC
SELECT * FROM HR.COUPON_COUPON WHERE COUPON_BUYER = #{id} ORDER BY COUPON_NUM ASC
